Reviews.Content: Great host Stayed at this great agriturismo at the start of october, which means the pool was closed (would be lovely in the summer) but we still had the jacuzzi and steam room to use which were both fantastic - highly recommend enjoying a glass of something in the jacuzzi whilst watching the sunset over the tuscan hills. Rooms were a little cold, although we had extra blankets. Food was wonderful, as was the wine - we would recommend the Frescobaldi Rufina. Views stunning, the owner/manager could not have been more accomodating. Would definitely recommend excellent value.
Reviews.Author: ce2-batson

Reviews.Content: Rustic        View of the house through the grapevines
Reviews.Author: aussiein

Reviews.Content: Great place and great staff Podere Castellare is located in a perfect place, near Firenze, Siena, Montalcino and in the middle of the Chianti Area. Everyday you can choose a different location to visit or spend your time in the swimming pool, tennis court or sauna.For ladies (I've seen my wife..) it's perfect because it's in the middle of outlet area (Prada, DG, The Mall).Giada and Graziano are very helpful and it's seems to be in a family.Very Very good!Michele
Reviews.Author: kalboni
